typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{2828519} as integer,
		{24450} as integer,
		{4451} as short,
		{33} as short,
		{34} as short,
		{4123,35} as string,
		{06} as string,
		{07} as string,
		R as string,
		F as boolean,
		{28.01.92} as string,
		{22.02.92} as string,
		{31.01.92} as string,
		{DELIVER IN PERSON        } as string,
		{REG AIR   } as string,
		{pending, unusual deposits s} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive() ~> DerivedColumns
